price: Nin jedhe ‘Gooftaa keessan araarama kadhaa; Inni Akkaan Araaramaadhan’.
arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: faqul'tu is'taghfirū rabbakum innahu kāna ghaffāran
